# Metastases

Metastases - PH458

## Requirements

[Docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/) and [CWLTool](https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltool#install)

## Configuration

Specify input dataset path in [Metastases-inputs.yml](Metastases-inputs.yml).

## Usage

Run: `cwltool Metastases.cwl Metastases-inputs.yml`
